sprint_goal: Establish the foundational tenant registration and user login flow with core security and accessibility standards in place.
Implement the complete user invitation and activation workflow, including role-based routing after login.
Deliver the core attendance marking functionality for Subordinates, including check-in/out with GPS and robust location permission handling.
Implement the complete offline attendance workflow, including local storage, automatic sync, and user notifications for persistent failures.
Establish core team and hierarchy management for Admins, and deliver the Supervisor's initial dashboard for viewing pending approvals.
Complete the Supervisor's approval workflow, including single and bulk approve/reject actions and visual flagging of exceptional records.
